column4: another question, a given program that, when installed in Ubuntu, works out of the box without the need of extra configuration (due to codecs, let's say), would also work straight after the installation in Xubuntu?
it should. the only way to be completely sure is to try
reason why i asked is beause i wanna try a lighter distro but i wouldnt do it if that means extra hassles with the programs hat i already learnt how to deal with.
xfce is easy to get used to, just boot off a live cd and try it out, or install the xubuntu-desktop package from the repo
